I like listening to the Gravity soundtrack whike playing KSP

Lolwut? Please don't go offtopic like that, there's an off-topic section of this forum, just for things like that.

Little update monitor to Mihara new version great plugin

Now we have GPS and maps

Kerbal style rescue mission
That is absoulutley awesome so will all there be a seperate tracking beacon to attach to ships and rovers or will it be built in

That is absoulutley awesome so will all there be a seperate tracking beacon to attach to ships and rovers or will it be built in

It tracks any vessel you target. If there is a call for actually displaying more than one vessel, I could in theory make it do that - but is there really?
Just had a looksie , .23 launches on Tuesday

All upgraded textures have same or lower quality.

First target this update great optimization.

SHINY Panels!

Just had a looksie , .23 launches on Tuesday

From here http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/61356-Kerbal-Space-Program-Update-0-23-Launches-Tuesday-December-17

Where did you source this info from?

They are using their tumblr quite a bit now. http://kerbaldevteam.tumblr.com/

Just tried the ANGARA pack, found the booster, unstable and way underpowered, the Soyuz U is a lot better. Which is a shame as I realky like the PPTS, and the look of the boosters

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/author/bobcat/

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/0-18-demv-mk-5-ant/

Why is that?

And another thing - any chance for updated MPSS nautilius pod with Rasta monitors? Its my favourite command capsule ever.
Bobcat has stated he will not be refreshing any of the old mods Nautilus, Jool V, Rovers, or HOME he will be releasing a new HOME pack which he is working on now
Wrong thread man.

ok i just need this clarification concerning docking ports.....

what passive docking ports are compatible with the Soyuz docking ports because i plan on building a station that will have supply runs by using some Soyuz craft so i just need to make sure....

also i don't want to have to redownload the manual so might as well ask now

ISS FGB has a huge impact rating, I de-orbited it from 104 Km and it survived the inevitable 'landing', just bounced around a bit but that was it.

Question; this keeps coming up, and I've gone back through the thread 30 pages now and not found an updated answer so... The Mir and Buran won't load again. It's probably the missing arms, but I've done a clean install of KSP, and downloaded the KAS linked on page 1, the Robotic Arms and the Soviet Pack and installed correctly. The GameData folder has "Bobcatind" "KAS" and "Romfarer" subfolders. I've started a game into Sandbox mode so it's not the tech tree locking off the parts. It just doesn't seem to want to load the arms in the latest Kerbal patch and thus blocks off the vehicles that use them. Does anyone know why please?
what game version?
